channel.title: Crazy Pkz Remake (Devision-Pk)
channel.description:
[center][URL=http://"http://devision-pk.oo.gd"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://devision-pk.oo.gd/forums"]Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://devision-pk.oo.gd/webclient.html"]Webclient[/URL] [URL=http://"https://dl.dropbox.com/u/90668764/client.jar"]Download[/URL]
I found this server cool back when i played this a long long time ago so i thought id make this my second server that i code and maybe soon release. Here is original pics that i found off google of how it useto be...
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/ivh743.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/23szwn8.jpg[/img][IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/p3y8k.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/t69mxl.jpg[/img]
Now here are mine.
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/9ETEz.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/AVcak.png[/img] [IMG]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/9393/0c94f802cd0841d08a40c55.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mU8FE.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RF6Sj.png[/img] [IMG]http://img507.imageshack.us/img507/9594/619b6e25d2204ea3b84114f.png[/img] [IMG]http://img15.imageshack.us/img15/4817/676cc0858a4d495e933ba7f.png[/img]
This is before i made the updates ;) constant players[/SIZE][/COLOR] [IMG]http://img193.imageshack.us/img193/4289/03efdf3554a24fee932dcb4.png[/img] [IMG]http://img690.imageshack.us/img690/5572/5c266cf66e514a43be773f3.png[/img]
Features Flawless Combat Clipped Following Clipped Combat following i forgot what item models but 565+ item models 2 Custom interfaces Ancient Curses Re Wrote combat system Oldschool Gameframe Cacke Szie is around 10-18kb Duel Arena Soulsplit Base I rewrote max hit forumla's for mage/melee/range Redid the spec max hits Npc+Player Clipped Following Correct Dragon Claws spec Formula Better defense system. All Barrows set affects works. Rs type stats. Perfect bonus's Near rs combat. Old school Gramframe Newer item models Most of all the skills work :)
Hope to see you on the server :)
Credits: Me Soulsplit old base(was crap tbh when i started on it) Crazy-pkz for the idea[/left][/center][/center]

item.title: Crazy Pkz Remake (Devision-Pk)
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

Rocket_Power:

So, is this an actual remake of Crazy Pkz, or did you just find the original source and begin hosting it?

It looks like the original with a few Tutorials added here and there.

Read full topic

@igotguts3 wrote:

[center]Website
Forums
Webclient
Download

I found this server cool back when i played this a long long time ago so i thought id make this my second server that i code and maybe soon release. Here is original pics that i found off google of how it useto be…



Now here are mine.

9ETEz.png770×528

AVcak.png769×527





This is before i made the updates constant players[/SIZE][/COLOR]

Features
Flawless Combat
Clipped Following
Clipped Combat following
i forgot what item models but 565+ item models
2 Custom interfaces
Ancient Curses
Re Wrote combat system
Oldschool Gameframe
Cacke Szie is around 10-18kb
Duel Arena
Soulsplit Base
I rewrote max hit forumla’s for mage/melee/range
Redid the spec max hits
Npc+Player Clipped Following
Correct Dragon Claws spec Formula
Better defense system.
All Barrows set affects works.
Rs type stats.
Perfect bonus’s
Near rs combat.
Old school Gramframe
Newer item models
Most of all the skills work

Hope to see you on the server

Credits:
Me
Soulsplit old base(was crap tbh when i started on it)
Crazy-pkz for the idea[/left][/center][/center]
